chunks.text: So consent to me is clear, concise communication about what the boundaries are for each person
and that's sort of got to be something you can talk about.
Well, maybe it could be given.
No, stop. Stop. Don't. No. No. No, stop. Stop.
I think it's also key to know that consent is reversible.
So you may consent in the moment, but if you get into the situation and then you don't feel comfortable that you can reverse that consent.

text: So consent to me is clear, concise communication about what the boundaries are for each person and that's sort of got to be something you can talk about. What do you want? What do you think? Well, maybe it could be given. No. No, stop. Stop. Don't. No. No. No, stop. Stop. Don't. Don't. No. Don't. Don't. Don't. I think it's also key to know that consent is reversible. So you may consent in the moment, but if you get into the situation and then you don't feel comfortable that you can reverse that consent.
